body_html: I don't see where you set the subprocess as daemonic. The flag is inherited from parent, but by default false I believe: https://docs.python.org/2/library/multiprocessing.html#multiprocessing.Process.daemon
body_text: I don't see where you set the subprocess as daemonic. The flag is inherited from parent, but by default false I believe: https://docs.python.org/2/library/multiprocessing.html#multiprocessing.Process.daemon
